definitions.definition: Any of many dried husked pulses ( legume ), including peas , beans and lentils .
A dish made from lentils, cooked with spices , tomatoes and onions etc.
A tropical herb with yellow flowers; the pigeon pea .

main_definition: Any of many dried husked pulses ( legume ), including peas , beans and lentils .
secondary_definitions: A dish made from lentils, cooked with spices , tomatoes and onions etc.
A tropical herb with yellow flowers; the pigeon pea .
